title: The Tout Terrain Touring Pedal II
content:
Two-sided pedals make sense for touring bikes. You can use a clipless shoe while touring and ride the flat pedals with your casual shoes when you get to town. Tout Terrain‘s new Touring Pedal II (84.90€) combines a griptape-coated platform with a clipless system for optimal grip and comfort, allowing you to ride in sneakers, sandals, or your favorite flat pedal shoe and the SPD clipless system of your choice.

Specs:

  • Shimano SPD system
  • Platform dimensions: 65mm x 100mm
  • CrMo steel axle
  • Sealed bearings
  • Weight: 400 g
  • 84.90 €

 

See more at Tout Terrain.
